info.title: NetworkManagementClient
info.description: The Microsoft Azure Network management API provides a RESTful set of web services that interact with Microsoft Azure Networks service to manage your network resources. The API has entities that capture the relationship between an end user and the Microsoft Azure Networks service.

get.description: Gets information about the specified application security group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: applicationSecurityGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the application security group.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns the specified application security group resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates an application security group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: applicationSecurityGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the application security group.

requestBody.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update ApplicationSecurityGroup operation.

201.description: Create successful. The operation returns the resulting application security group resource.

200.description: Update successful. The operation returns the resulting application security group resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes the specified application security group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: applicationSecurityGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the application security group.

204.description: Request successful. Resource does not exist.

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Updates an application security group's tags.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: applicationSecurityGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the application security group.

requestBody.description: Parameters supplied to update application security group tags.

200.description: Update successful. The operation returns the resulting ApplicationSecurityGroup resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets all application security groups in a subscription.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a list of application security group resources.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets all the application security groups in a resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a list of application security group resources.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

properties.description: Properties of the application security group.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

ApplicationSecurityGroup.description: An application security group in a resource group.

resourceGuid.description: The resource GUID property of the application security group resource. It uniquely identifies a resource, even if the user changes its name or migrate the resource across subscriptions or resource groups.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the application security group resource.

value.description: A list of application security groups.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

ApplicationSecurityGroupListResult.description: A list of application security groups.
